text: “thæcring brrda phu thi ptiseth sraththa nan phwk khea ca bricakh thraphysin khxng phwk khea pheux khadkhwang(phukhn) hı xxk cak cak kar ngan khx ngxallxhˌ læw phwk khea k ca bricakh man tx pi phayhlang thraphysin nan k ca klay pen khwam seiycı kæ phwk khea læw phwk khea k ca di rab khwam prachay dwy læa brrda phu thi ptiseth sraththa nan phwk khea ca thuk txn pi su nrk yahannam”
